channel.title: Python on Moselog
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Moselog

item.title: Thought about python from a rubyist
item.description: This weekend there was a python conference here in Taipei (pycon apac). As Gandi was sponsoring it, I went there and tried to figure out how python and ruby communities differ in my local area. As a matter of fact, I also push my python coding skills a bit. I kind of like to nurture a general polyglot approach. It first seems that the python community is more largely supported by sponsors than ruby one.
